Welcome To the site of Dhrubo Kamal

I am Dhrubo Kamal. I study computer Science in Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology.I have been active in many co-curricular activities in my school,college and university.I am in the debate circuit for 7+ years,which make me confident about my presentation skill.Programming is my passion,which encouraged me to study Computer Science. I like solving problems,innovating things. I want to be a part of the next tech-revolution.

I am heavily influenced by the life philosophy of Steve Jobs.
